text: E'ina hu'negu Jerusalemi kumapima nemaniza vahera zamasamige'za, zamasunku hu'za zamaseni zamazokara hare netre'za, zavi krafa hu'za mago'zama omane agonaramimpina vano hiho. Na'ankure menima fore'ma haza vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofona tusiza hu'za azeri arimpa hazageno ana zanku huno Agra zamatreno amefi huzami'ne.
